message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but that price is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $11000. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $11000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm now offering the product to you for $12000.
